reviews.review: Игра классная но со временем надоест.
Отличный шутер от первого лица! Очень счастлив что я играю в эту игру. Спасибо разработчикам за случайный продукт))
10 years later, still the best fps.

Their is something special about Counter Strike Source. The game is a limbo bettween Counter Strike Condition Zero and CS:GO. The game of course gets you gmod textures and if you don't have gmod (what are you doing buy it already). But the game is more than that, it has a good blend bettween custom games and standard games. My problem with the game is that their are no more classic games. No 5v5's. Most games are custom maps or empty. I go on a server for an hour (a popular server on dust 2/cs office)
and no one connected until a couple did. Now with most people gone to cs:go (including me) and most have played for around 3-15 years(I took a survey in game multiple times) so not many new players join in so beware and learn to bhop :) last words:great game even if you have cs:go (I have all the cs's and their all diffrent)

Suomi Versio:  Heidän on jotain erikoista Counter Strike Source . Peli onlimbo bettween Counter Strike ja CS : GO . Peli tietenkin sinut gmod kuvioita ja jos sinulla ei ole gmod ( mitä teet ostaa sen jo ) . Mutta peli on enemmän kuin, että se onhyvä sekoitus bettween custom pelit ja standardi pelejä . Minun ongelmani kanssapeli on, että heidän ei enää klassikkoa . Ei 5v5 : n . Useimmat pelit ovat omia karttoja tai tyhjä. Lähdenpalvelintunti (suosittu palvelinta pöly 2 / cs toimisto )
ja kukaan kytkettynä, kunnespari teki. Nyt useimmat ihmiset menneet cs : go ( minä mukaan lukien ) ja useimmat ovat olleet noin 3-15 vuotta ( otinkysely pelin useita kertoja ) niin ei paljon uusia pelaajia liittymään niin varokaa ja oppia bhop :) viimeiset sanat : hyvä peli , vaikka sinulla on cs : go ( minulla on kaikkics : n ja niiden kaikki erillaista ) ;)

Отличный наследник C.S. 1.6. 
Сделано на хорошем движке source, благодаря чему графка, довольно красивая.
Была проработана механика и физика.
Да и в общем на 2004 год, это был прорыв в серии Counter-Strike.
Откровенно сравнивать 1.6 и source - нельзя, ведь 1.6 это прородитель этой замечательной игры.
В итоге Valve сделали потрясающий шутер, который мы и ждали.

Рекомендую игру всем. Но в основном игра для экшона и скилла . Так что подготовтесь. Игра понравилась, играю, по часу одному-два. Не жмите денег, ради игры. Покупайте CSS, вся линейка Counter-Strike , очень понравилась. Вы лучшие. РЕКОМЕНДУЮ!!!

"советую всем , думаю она понравится каждому . так что не линитесь потратить немного денег и купить этот шедевр.

If you are between the ages of three and eight, please read carefully. Owning Counter-Strike: Source is now the only proof that you are not a baby. If you don't have this game, People will think you wear diapers, and cry all the time. Everybody will think you sleep in a crib, and drink from a bottle, if you don't have Counter-Strike: Source. And whenever you speak, all people will hear is, "Goo goo, Ga ga". So tell your mum or dad to buy you Counter-Strike: Source. Because otherwise, as far as anyone's concerned, you're a baby.

Egy régi kedvenc. Itt sajnos nem nagyon játszottam még vele. Széleskörű, van benne pár játékosok által behozott játékmód. Ilyenek pl. surf, zm, gungame és még sok más. Nekem személy szerint sokkal jobban tetszik mint a cs go. Persze kinek mi... Megkapja a pozitív értékelést, de néha nagyon idegesítő, hogy itt is a fejre megy az összes lövés. Az ak úgy lő mint a cs go-s negev. Szóval nem nagyon lehet vele célozni. Ennyi pénzért nem drága.

Игра очень хорошая графика на высшем уровне!

Hallo Traubenfreunde, 
auf der Suche nach einem neuen Königreich bin ich auf dieses Spiel gestoßen. Ich möchte euch gerne meine Meinung dazu sagen. Alles begann gestern Nachmittag auf dem Weg zum Einkaufsmarkt meines Vertrauens. Ich dachte mir: Jetzt, wo das Müsli seit zwei Tagen leer ist wird es Zeit für eine neue Packung. Gesagt, getan. Ohne Vorahnung stolzierte ich mit gekröntem Haupte in den Laden. Und dort sah ich einen Stand mit Steamguthabenkarten. Genau daneben entdeckte ich dann den Knüller: Bananen für 0,89 € das Kilo. Da musste ich natürlich sofort zugreifen. Und ich kann euch nun einen Tag später sagen, dass das wohl die beste Investition meines Lebens war. Das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis bei diesen Bananen ist wahrlich unbeschreiblich. Ich kann nur jedem empfehlen: Kauft ein, es lohnt sich wirklich.

Euer Traubenkönig

Counter Strike: Source is the most time consuming game I've ever played. Despite that I never really played it seriously with the aim to play competitive in tournaments, I was more a fun gamer who would play for fun with a few friends on public servers and play various different gamemodes.
Since there aren't any official tournaments for CS:S anymore, playing it for that aspect will not be possible anymore. The only thing you could do if you want to intensively play competitive is play in leagues in the ESEA or ESL. Players wanting to play in a team in a tournament one day should obviously get CS:GO and play that instead of CS:S.
But despite that there is not a huge competitive scene anymore this game can still be lots of fun. But in my opinion the fun is only limited to the various gamemodes which are modded into the game like Zombiemod, Gungame, Bunnyhopping and a lot more which are too much to list. Some of them still include the original type of gameplay while others are completely different and can bring you a whole new experience.
But it would be too nice if there would be nothing you can complain about, right? In this case it is the cheaters situation. When you casually play on public servers you will encounter so many cheaters that it is actually unplayable. Because of that there is less room to practice and you will get bored of the game really fast, because who likes to play against cheaters?
The sad thing about this is that the majority of the cheaters most likely won't get banned at all by Valves official anti-cheat, and even if they do, they will just get the game again on a new account when it is on sale for small money.
Overall I do recommend this game, but only for people who want to play this game for fun and are not trying to get especially good in it or so. The various different gamemodes you can try out were the reason why this game was so addictive for a long time, and I would definitely recommend to try a few out.

POW! POW! OH NO! MAN DOWN! MAN DOWN! This First Person Shooter is an actionpacked, realistic shooter game, guaranteed to be worth your money. For all you GMod (Garry's Mod) players out there I would recommend buying the two-pack of Garry's Mod and Counter-Strike: Source, not only for the fact of getting two amazing games cheap, but Counter-Strike: Source gives an amazing resolution for when playing multiplayer, and takes away annoying screen bugs. Thank you, and I hope my review was helpful -LokiSmokey
